events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because it does not match what I purchased.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to the customer receiving the incorrect product.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect order item.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you received the wrong item, and Iâ€™m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number to begin processing your refund?
Here is the photo of the wrong item I received, and my order number is 45789. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your payment method within 3-5 business days and send you a prepaid return label.
Thanks for the quick response and the solution offered. I appreciate the prepaid return label and refund process.
Your refund request has been processed, and you should see the amount credited in your account shortly. We have sent the return label to your email.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with regarding your order.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing your refund case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your refund experience to help us improve our service.
